value.title: GPU access to power up India’s AI play: experts

value.title: Broadcom sees US$10 billion in AI chip sales in 2024, but shares dip
value.excerpt: Broadcom said on Thursday it expects US$10 billion in revenue from chips related to artificial intelligence this year, but its stock dipped after the tech company’s full-year forecast failed to impress investors.

value.title: The Dark Side of Open Source AI Image Generators
value.excerpt: Open source tools allow anyone to make AI art. They have also been used to produce nonconsensual deepfake porn.
